channel.title: Testscape problems, with ocmpile please help me i beg of you
channel.description:
ok when ever i run compile it says [scar] system cannont find the path specificed cannont find the path specificed[/scar]
i entered this @echo off COLOR 08 title Spaderscape Server "C:program files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06injavac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:program files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06in/java.exe" server pause what is wrong?!? i cant do anything for my server becuase i need to compile it first.... i'm so mad!!! help me please i have jdk 1.5, i just got it... i saved it in the program files/java folder...is that right? do i have to put it somewhere else? thanks alot

item.title: Testscape problems, with ocmpile please help me i beg of you
item.dc:creator: @saintspader saintspader
item.description:
@saintspader wrote:

ok when ever i run compile it says [scar] system cannont find the path specificed
cannont find the path specificed[/scar]

i entered this
@echo off
COLOR 08
title Spaderscape Server
“C:program files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06injavac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:program files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06in/java.exe” server
pause
what is wrong?!? i cant do anything for my server becuase i need to compile it first… i’m so mad!!! help me please i have jdk 1.5, i just got it… i saved it in the program files/java folder…is that right? do i have to put it somewhere else? thanks alot
